definitions.definition: A device for moving or compressing a liquid or gas.
definitions.example: This pump can deliver 100 gallons of water per minute.

definitions.definition: An instance of the action of a pump; one stroke of a pump; any action similar to pumping
definitions.example: It takes thirty pumps to get 10 litres; he did 50 pumps of the weights.

definitions.definition: A device for dispensing liquid or gas to be sold, particularly fuel.
definitions.example: This pump is out of order, but you can gas up at the next one.

definitions.definition: A swelling of the muscles caused by increased blood flow following high intensity weightlifting.
A ride on a bicycle given to a passenger, usually on the handlebars or fender.
definitions.example: She gave the other girl a pump on her new bike.

definitions.definition: The heart.
(British slang) The vagina.
To use a pump to move (liquid or gas).
definitions.example: I've pumped over 1000 gallons of water in the last ten minutes.

definitions.definition: (often followed by up) To fill with air.
definitions.example: He pumped up the air-bed by hand, but used the service station air to pump up the tyres.

definitions.definition: To move rhythmically, as the motion of a pump.
definitions.example: I pumped my fist with joy when I won the race.

definitions.definition: To shake (a person's hand) vigorously.
To gain information from (a person) by persistent questioning.
To use a pump to move liquid or gas.
definitions.example: I've been pumping for over a minute but the water isn't coming through.

definitions.definition: To be going very well.
definitions.example: Last night's party was really pumping.

definitions.definition: To kick, throw or hit the ball far and high.
To pass gas; to fart.
To pass (messages) into a program so that it can obey them.
(British slang) To copulate.
To weightlift.
A type of shoe, a trainer or sneaker.
A type of women's shoe which leaves the instep uncovered and has a relatively high heel, especially a stiletto (with a very high and thin heel)
definitions.example: She was wearing a lovely new pair of pumps.

definitions.definition: A dancing shoe.
A type of shoe without a heel.
